name: SBW Timeline
author: Ilona Ferenc

sections.description: SBW Timeline is an easy to use plugin that let’s you create a responsive, vertical timeline perfect to feature on your wedding or event website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘sbw-timeline’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ tab in the WordPress menu
  3. Add the sbwhea_get_timeline() function to your template files where you want to display your timeline
  4. To add events to your timeline, go to the Timeline Events tab in the WordPress menu and create new posts

short_description: SBW Timeline is an easy to use plugin that let's you create a responsive, vertical timeline perfect to feature on your wedding or event website.
